title: 7 card raw HOF lot: Cobb, Johnson, Speaker - SOLD
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: 7 card raw HOF lot: Cobb, Johnson, Speaker - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Asking $1000 delivered:

Frank Chance (Portrait, Yellow Background)PB
Ty Cobb (Bat Off Shoulder)P350
Johnny Evers (With Bat, Cubs On Shirt)SC150-30
Miller Huggins (Portrait)P350
Walter Johnson (Pitching)OM
Tris SpeakerP350
Joe Tinker (Hands On Knees)P150
Someone got a hell of a deal!!!
